contentencoded:
Does your family have rules for tech at the dinner table? Before meals, one father makes his children surrender their mobile phones to him -- even his adult children in their twenties.

Janell Burley Hofmann is a Cape Cod mother of five who helps us understand how to behave with technology. She tells Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson how one family handles tech etiquette.
